00021 #ifndef _FileUtils_HEADER_
00022 #define _FileUtils_HEADER_
00023 
00024 /*! \file FileUtils.h This file provides file utilities.
00025  */
00026 
00027 #include <cstring>
00028 #include <fstream>
00029 #include <list>
00030 #include <string>
00031 //
00032 
00033 namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities
00034 {
00035 
00036 /*! This class provides utility functions for files. */
00037 class FileUtils
00038 {
00039 public:
00040         /*! Checks for the existance of a file.
00041          *
00042          * @param fileName The name of the file to test for existance.
00043          * @return True if the file exists.
00044          */
00045         static bool Exists(const char *fileName);
00046 
00047         /*! Locks a file for exclusive use.
00048          * This is a soft locking mechanism. The actual file is not locked, instead
00049          * it uses a "LCK" file to determine the lock status.
00050          *
00051          * @param fileName The name of the file to lock.
00052          * @return True if the file was successfully locked.
00053          */
00054         static bool LockFile(const char *fileName);
00055 
00056         /*! Unlocks a file for exclusive use.
00057          * This is a soft locking mechanism. The actual file is not locked, instead
00058          * it uses a "LCK" file to determine the lock status.
00059          *
00060          * @param fileName The name of the file to unlock.
00061          * @return True if the file was successfully unlocked.
00062          */
00063         static bool UnlockFile(const char *fileName);
00064 
00065         /*! Retrieves the list of files in a path that match the extension.
00066          *
00067          * @param pathName The path to search.
00068          * @param ext The file extension.
00069          * @return The list of files (full path) found in the directory.
00070          */
00071         static std::list<std::string> ListFiles(const char *pathName, const char *ext);
00072 
00073         /*! Deletes a file.
00074          * @param fileName The name of the file to delete.
00075          * @return True if the file was deleted.
00076          */
00077         static bool RemoveFile(const char *fileName);
00078 
00079         /*! Deletes a file.
00080          * @param path The name of the path to delete.
00081          * @return True if the path was deleted.
00082          */
00083         static void RemovePath(const char *path);
00084 };
00085 
00086 };
00087 
00088 #endif // _FileUtils_HEADER_
